SEARCH
Package bank.nodb

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
bank.nodb.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
Each Bank represents a bank.
Author:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)

    • queryZipCode

      public Integer queryZipCode(String accountNumber)
      Returns the ZIP code of the owner of the specified BankAccount.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number of a BankAccount
      Returns:
      the ZIP code of the owner of the specified BankAccount

    • queryAccountNumberZipCode

      public Stream<Map.Entry<String,Integer>> queryAccountNumberZipCode()
      Returns, for each BankAccount, the account number and the ZIP code of the owner of that BankAccount
      Returns:
      a Stream of Entry<String, Integer> instances each representing the account number and the ZIP code of the owner of a BankAccount

    • queryZipCodeCustomers

      public Stream<Map.Entry<Integer,Long>> queryZipCodeCustomers()
      Finds the number of Customers for each ZIP code.
      Returns:
      a Stream of Entry instances each containing a ZIP code and the number of Customers

    • queryCustomers

      public Stream<Customer> queryCustomers(int zipCode)
      Returns a Stream of Customers whose ZIP code is equal to the specified ZIP code.
      Parameters:
      zipCode - a ZIP code
      Returns:
      a Stream of Customers whose ZIP code is equal to the specified ZIP code

    • queryZipCodeAccounts

      public Stream<Map.Entry<Integer,Long>> queryZipCodeAccounts()
      Finds the number of BankAccounts for each ZIP code.
      Returns:
      a Stream of Entry instances each containing a ZIP code and the number of BankAccounts

    • queryMaxBalanceBankAccounts

      public Stream<BankAccount> queryMaxBalanceBankAccounts()
      Finds the BankAccounts with the maximum balance (i.e., the BankAccounts whose balance is not smaller than any other BankAccount).
      Returns:
      a Stream of the BankAccounts with the maximum balance

    • addData

      public static void addData(int customers, BiConsumer<String,Integer> addCustomer, BiConsumer<String,Map.Entry<String,Double>> addAccount)
      Adds data related to customers and accounts of bank.
      Parameters:
      customers - the number of customers of the bank
      addCustomer - a BiConsumer for adding each customer
      addAccount - a BiConsumer for adding each account
